title: Who is the most known Norwegian in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: ** Kristopher Hivju (Game of Thrones, c’mon) ** Henrik Ibsen (playwright) ** Sissel Kirkjebø (singer) ** Frederik Skavlan (great talk show host) ** Roald Amundsen (explorer) ** Thor Hyerdahl (explorer) ** Erna Solberg (premiere) ** The lovely Aurora (singer and absolute sweetie) ** Tor Egil & Mari Kreken (Americana musicians Darling West) ** Ingrid Helene Håvik (Indi artist Highasakite) To name but a few… OK more than one, but there are so many!

Most of the names from other answers I don’t even know/recognize. Greig (I thought it’s Grieg?) and Breivik perhaps (the latter not one worth remembering). My brain came up immediately with the name Magnus Carlsson (chess grandmaster; but hey, that’s probably because I like to watch agadmator’s chess channel… despite not being interested in chess ;-), and yes, somebody mentioned the pop band a-ha.

Friday, October 23, 2020. The Question: Who is the most known Norwegian in the world? bala Ramakrishnan (bR)’s Answer: There are many, including… Playwright Henrik Ibsen (A Doll’s House), Artist Edward Munch (“Scream”), Actress Liv Ulmann to name just three.  I Do Hope This Answers Your Question… bR
I am not sure about others but for me the most famous Norwegians are Erik the Red & Thor Heyerdahl… Oh, and A-ha!! :D  #Childhood
